document.heading: Judgment Lien on Property Amendment Act of 1996

history.narrative: Law 11-136, the “Judgment Lien on Property Amendment Act of 1996,” was introduced in Council and Assigned Bill No. 11-508, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 5, 1996, and April 2, 1996, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 11, 1996, it was assigned Act No. 11-248 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D. C. Law 11-136 became effective on June 6, 1996.
